channel.title: pdf on Willem's blog
channel.description: Recent content in pdf on Willem's blog

item.title: The Netware Core Protocol
item.description:
An early version of the 1996 document

Listing functions available in the Novell Netware Core Protocol.

item.title: My ancient IBM PC research
item.description:
These are some very old notes I found on my old IBM PC.

  • 1995-03-01 15:21:52 connecto.rs
  • 1995-05-01 13:14:14 hardware.nfo
  • 1994-05-16 15:28:18 jumpers
  • 1994-03-01 13:55:34 port.wj

As you can see, back then I did not really care about file extensions.

item.title: MSDOS Interrupt catcher
item.description:
I wrote this tool to be able to create traces of DOS interrupt invocations. A bit like strace or ltrace on linux.

Now available on github.

item.title: Demon dialer control program
item.description:
The demon dialer was a blue-box, sold by hacktic.

I wrote these tools to be able to dialing lots of phonenumbers relatively quickly, while recording information about whatever answered. I used to do this in order to find some way of accessing the early internet.

Now available on github.

item.title: Game of Life
item.description:
One of my early LIFE implementations.

I think I implemented this on almost every computer I owned, I remember writing my first version in Basic on my PET-2001.

Now available on github.
